comment._content: I believe this neighborhood is in between Broad St Rd and modern day Parham Rd. I dont know the name of it. A Verizon telephone company building sits across the street from it now.

comment._content: Woodlawn Farms is the name. Here is the plat survey www.co.henrico.va.us/maps/fdisplay.php?file=S04_421.pdf&a...
